summary: This release brings powerful new authentication options to Grove, including passkey, 2FA, and Discord OAuth for a more secure and flexible login experience. We've also enhanced blog reading with Safari Reader support and improved the editor's usability, all while strengthening our security posture and resolving key deployment issues. It's a significant step toward a more robust and user-friendly platform for everyone.

features: deploy Clearing status page to production
add Safari Reader mode support for blog posts
add test coverage and shared validation utilities
expand authIcons group with shieldcheck, mail, and login
improve blog editor UX and fix multi-tenant content loading
add authentication and action icons to central system
add Discord OAuth, passkey, and 2FA support
add live Stripe price IDs for all subscription tiers
fixes: remove invalid rel attribute from address element
resolve deployment type errors in plant package
improve validation and error messages per PR review
resolve type errors in engine and plant packages
address PR review security and accessibility issues
hide MobileMenu on desktop and improve closed state
ensure Stripe checkout redirects to plant.grove.place
resolve TypeScript errors in auth rate limiting (#297)
prevent duplicate zero in release summary JSON
